citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
01/13/2015.
Inspector spoke with person who stated that licensee was out of town working and was unsure of return time.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
